channel.title: Film Preservation on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Film Preservation on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: The Lazarus Libraries
item.description: Hey all, Ernie here with a piece from Andrew Egan, who is following his recent interest in film in a couple of new directions this time around. Check out what he found. Today in Tedium: Among the many pieces of dubious “evidence” cited by conspiracy theorists that say the moon landing was faked is the fact that the tapes of the original transmission were erased over. Surely, if America had actually landed on the moon those recordings would be an invaluable part of human history and not treated so carelessly as to be erased on accident years later.
